content: this is a legal summary of a case being heard in the county court osijek the previous court involved was the municipal court zagreb the plaintiff was owed 443640 hrk by the counterparty the court decided to dissolve the coownership of a property and sell it at a public auction with the sale value divided between the parties according to their ownership shares the counterpartys appeal was partially justified and they were ordered to reimburse the plaintiff for their share of the costs the court made its decision based on relevant laws and the case was resolved
